about_the_game:
The Dark Dragonlord has returned and wreaked havoc across the land. You have returned as an incarnation of the Ancient Hero, the Legendary Dragoon. You must travel the lands and defeat the Elemental Dragons in order to collect their Elemental Tablets. Once you have collected the Elemental Tablets, you will be ready to face the Dark Dragonlord and return Light and Hope to the World!

Path of Dragoon is a Turn Based Fantasy RPG that takes inspiration from Dragon Quest and Final Fantasy.

Key Features
  • Fishing Minigame: Purchase Bait from the Fisherman and Fish at any Fishing Pond to collect points that can be spent on Unique Items.
  • Restore a Kingdom: Complete Quests and Rescue Villagers to open up new opportunities to increase your power.
  • Dragoon Crystals: Collect these items from defeated enemies and use them to upgrade your Legendary Dragoon Armor.
  • Mining and Smithing: Mine Ores and Gems to turn into new Equipment or Strengthen your current equipment.

CREDITS


Thanks to THALZON for their awesome Battlers!

Thanks to Steam Users Tytatj, c_hanke2, RyanLFG, and
HorribleGamr for assisting with playtesting!

Thanks to Sara Garrard () for some of
the Background Music!

Other Background Music licensed through Envato
Elements!

name: Path of Dragoon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (32-bit/64-bit) or macOS/OS X
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with at least 128MB video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, Mouse, or Touchpad required

short_description: Path of Dragoon is a Fantasy RPG that is inspired by Dragon Warrior and Final Fantasy. When not completing the Main Quest, you can restore the Kingdom by completing quests for villagers. You can Mine, Fish, and Explore the world to discover powerful items and abilities.
